channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I prepaid our mom’s rent for a year’: My sister is a millionaire and never helps our mother. How do I cut her out of her will?
item.description: “I have worked for more than six months to get my elderly mother a place to live.”

item.title: Lots of young people are clueless about money — older folks aren’t much better
item.description: For older investors, every money-related decision can affect the size and safety of their nest egg.

item.title: Service side of economy shrinks for first time in almost a year — another trade war casualty
item.description: The large service side of the U.S. economy contracted in May for the first time in almost a year, another victim of ongoing trade wars that have froze...

item.title: Weakest ADP jobs report in two years points to hiring freeze tied to trade wars. Is the worst over?
item.description: Privately run businesses created just 37,000 new jobs in May — the smallest increase in more than two years — as the worst global trade wars since the...

item.title: ‘He failed in his fiduciary duty’: My brother liquidated our mother’s 401(k) for her nursing home. He claimed the rest.
item.description: “My brother, the executor of her will, coerced her during her illness to give him power of attorney.”

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
